                                                                                  Chicago,
                                                              IL
                                        60612    Calendar  Download iCal File    Download     o4u        O4U is an amazing opportunity for students to meet recruiters from a variety of engineering firms and universities, with flights and hotels that are covered entirely by O4U. This means that if students are admitted from a college/university, they will only have to pay the $90 registration fee!    The Fall 2020 O4U Engineering Conference will include:   Inspiring keynote speeches from senior LGBTQ engineering executives  Intimate mentorship discussions with supportive peers and professionals  Opportunities to hear about life and work across roles, cities, and companies  A career fair with representatives from leading engineering firms  Networking time and opportunities to build deep, lasting relationships   Apply here    Contact  Eliana Riley  312-355-5142  eliana@uic.edu     Date posted  Apr 6, 2020    Date updated  Apr 6, 2020
